document.full_text: former massachusetts governor mitt romney leads potential republican primary opponents in the early voting state of new hampshire, but celebrity candidate donald trump has substantial support, according to a new poll.
document.title: romney still up in new hampshire; trump a wild card
lines_and_colors: former massachusetts governor mitt romney leads potential republican primary opponents in the early voting state of new hampshire, but celebrity candidate donald trump has substantial support, according to a new poll.
